title: Ticket #3963: New style Core file creator
description:
We wished to highly modify what we do within our test infrastructure when we detect either a log ERROR statement or a core file. Iterative changes in the build and test lab were time consuming and thus this test allowed local workspace testing to generate the no core and error file handling.

The test runs a simple job from the Check folder followed by a log search for the daemon's chosen(currently negotiator) PID from it's log file(Using Check log searching tools. When the on_match callback occurs, we extract to PID and send kill -SIGSEGV.
